attributes.action: Sack George Osborne, the role of MP is a full time, privileged position.
attributes.additional_details:
George's Jobs

MP for Tatton — £74,000pa
Senior advisor to investment manager Blackrock — £650,000pa
Public speaker for Washington Speaker Bureau — £786,450 (2016) 
Kissinger Fellow for the McCain Institute — £120,000
Chairman of the Northern Powerhouse Project — pro bono
Editor of the Evening Standard — salary unknown
attributes.background: He is elected as a Member of Parliament to serve the people of his Constituency of Tatton in Cheshire. This should be a full time post if he is to serve his Consitiuents to the best of his ability, so how can he possibly have time for all these other demanding posts that he is handsomely paid for ?

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual MP is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/191268
